00046 #ifndef _FC_TRACK_H_
00047 #define _FC_TRACK_H_
00048 
00049 #ifdef __cplusplus
00050 extern "C" {
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 // Tracking routines
00054 FC_ReturnCode fc_trackStep(int stepIndex, int numNew, FC_Subset* newSegments,
00055                        FC_FeatureGroup* featureGroup);
00056 FC_ReturnCode fc_trackAllSteps(int numStep, int* numSegments, 
00057                        FC_Subset** segments, FC_FeatureGroup* featureGroup);
00058 
00059 // Customizable tracking routines
00060 FC_ReturnCode fc_trackStep_custom(int stepIndex, int numNew, 
00061                  FC_Subset* newSegments, FC_FeatureGroup* featureGroup,
00062                  int compute_scores(int, FC_Subset*, int, FC_Subset*, 
00063                            double***),
00064                        int compute_correspondence(int, int, double**, int***),
00065                  int add_rois_to_features(int, int, int, FC_Subset*,
00066                               int**, FC_FeatureGroup*));
00067 FC_ReturnCode fc_trackAllSteps_custom(int numStep, int* numSegments, 
00068                        FC_Subset** segments, FC_FeatureGroup* featureGroup,
00069                        int compute_scores(int, FC_Subset*, int, FC_Subset*, 
00070                            double***),
00071                        int compute_correspondence(int, int, double**, int***),
00072                  int add_rois_to_features(int, int, int, FC_Subset*, 
00073                                                 int**, FC_FeatureGroup*));
00074 
00075 // Default routines for tracking
00076 FC_ReturnCode fc_computeNumOverlapScore(int numPrev, FC_Subset* prevSegments, 
00077                  int numNew, FC_Subset* newSegments, double*** scores);
00078 FC_ReturnCode fc_computeSimpleCorrespond(int numPrev, int numNew, 
00079                        double** scores, int*** matrix);
00080 FC_ReturnCode fc_addROIsUsingBasicEvents(int stepIndex, int numPrev, 
00081                  int numNew, FC_Subset* newSegments, int** matrix, 
00082                        FC_FeatureGroup* featureGroup);
00083 
00084 // Related routines
00085 
00086 // Given a self-correspondance matrix for a group of objects, figure out
00087 // how they should be grouped
00088 FC_ReturnCode fc_groupSelfCorrespond(int num, int** corresponds, int* numGroup,
00089                          int** numPerGroup, int***idsPerGroup);

00092 #ifdef __cplusplus
00093 }
